exceptions.deleted_transaction: A deleted debt cannot be deleted again.
exceptions.duplicate_contribution_period: Previously paid dues cannot be re-paid.
exceptions.negative_other: Other transaction cannot be smaller than zero.
exceptions.not_last_payment: Payments other than the last payment of a debt cannot be deleted.
exceptions.overpayment: Paid amount cannot be more than the remaining debt
exceptions.there_is_payment: A debt with a payment cannot be deleted.
